TopicTitle: Let's Play Kerbal Space Program - It's only simple Rocket Science!...Right??

Articles.Content:
w65lFOhxf
We're new to this whole series, and this is part 2 of our Lets Play series.


We're absolutely terrible at the moment, but we're trying to get better. We're learning as we go on, and learning to appreciate how utterly deep this game is.

Thanks for taking a look!
